cantAddOfferIfMoreThan1picture: Can not add an offer if you have more than one picture
confirmationText:
Your ad will be saved on your computer.

You must then transmit the zip file to the representative assistant by your La Presse FTP access.

errors.zipOnly: The ad submitted must be a zip file.
errors.treatmentPhp: The ad was successfully uploaded, but encountered a problem while treatment.
errors.sourceMissing: _source.json was not found in the .zip of the ad.
errors.renderAd: An error occurred while creating the preview of your ad.
errors.zipCompression: An error occurred while compressing your ad into a zip file ready for download.
errors.createFolders: An error occurred while creating the needed files for your ad in our folder "temps".

iConfirm: I confirm that the data entered are accurate and in accordance with technical requirements.
lossOffersInfos:
will result in the loss of the information entered in subsequent offers.

Do you still want to proceed?

meta.description: Les Incontournables du voyage is a creative advertising tools available to advertisers wishing to post an ad in the travel section of La Presse+.

mustContainNoSpecialcharacters: Letters, numbers, and underscores only please
title: Title

warning.adblock: Using the AdBlock extension could corrupt the generation of your ad. We strongly suggest you turn it off for this site.
warning.adblockRender: Using the AdBlock extension may be causing the problem. We strongly suggest you turn it off for this site.
warning.browserPreview: Please note that the ad generated is for tablet (iOS / Android). Therefore, it is possible that under {{browser}} the preview does not match what is displayed on this medium. For greater reliability, we suggest you preview your ad in Chrome or Safari.

warningChange: Please note that the change of
zipMac: Your zip file could be automatically unzipped by Safari depending your settings (General tab, last option).
